com.planetj.taste.impl.model.file
Class FileDataModel

java.lang.Object
  com.planetj.taste.impl.model.file.FileDataModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Refreshable, DataModel
public class FileDataModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataModel

A DataModel backed by a comma-delimited file. This class assumes that each line of the file contains a user ID, followed by item ID, followed by preferences value, separated by commas. The item ID is assumed to be parseable as a long, and the preference value is assumed to be parseable as a double.

This class is not intended for use with very large amounts of data (over, say, a million rows). For that, MySQLJDBCDataModel and a database are more appropriate. The file will be periodically reloaded if a change is detected.

Author:
Sean Owen
